description:
After a few quiet months we're back in June with two or three exciting talks!

Martin Tournoij - "Experiences with Go testing" (~45mins)

Benjamin King - vgo (~10mins)

Kat Zien - TBC (~10mins, we'll postpone it till the next month it if the other talks run for a bit longer)

The current plan is to meet at the Prince Street Social (look out for the plushie gophers), but if we get more than 15-20 people signed up for the event we'll change to a different venue (which is near cabot circus), so keep an eye out for any announcements!

Hope to see you there!
title: Experiences with Go testing + lightning talks
